artist: Artist: Hirano Gogaku; Artist: Hoashi Kyōu
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: monk wearing black robe, holding rosary in both hands rides backwards on a horse; large, halo-like woven hat behind head; PR leg folded across horse with PL leg hanging off side of horse; monk has mostly bald head with dark beard, large earlobes, and determined look on face; horse is turned away at 3/4 view; inscription ULQ; short inscription LRQ
inscription: Inscription UL: 倒騎東??是狂(?生)?不放貞西(去?)恩報徳???欽仰當年法力房
markings: R side of upper dowel, when rolled, in pen: [Kyou Monk]; URQ, borderless relief seal; L edge, just above center:知雨; square intaglio:岳字五岳; L edge center square, borderless relief: 古竹園主; LRQ, small square relief:致大
signed: UL: 古(竹?)??岳 LRQ: 杏雨?颿足寫
title: Monk Riding Backwards
